term.title: ketoses

item.text: Ketonic parent sugars (polyhydroxyketones H–[CHOH]n–C(=O)[CHOH]m–H with three or more carbon atoms) and their intramolecularhemiacetals. The oxo group is usually at C-2. E.g. d-fructose: [image: Not defined]
